column2: The cat sat on the mat.
The cat ran quickly across the entire neighborhood looking for food.
column4: Кот быстро бежал через весь район в поисках еды.
Я не могу в это поверить.

column2: The cat walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and walked and finally stopped.
column4: Кот шёл и шёл и наконец остановился.
